content: * Expects negative $0.03 impact on net income and operating EPS in Q3 2017 from recent natural disasters​
name: Eaton Corporation PLC
title: BRIEF-Eaton Corporation sees negative impact in Q3 from hurricanes

content: Sept 20 Eaton corp wins dismissal of shareholder lawsuit accusing company of securities fraud -- u.s. Judge INVESTORS CLAIMED THAT EATON MISLED THEM ABOUT A PLANNED STRATEGIC SHIFT AWAY FROM ITS TRADITIONAL VEHICLE AND AUTOMOTIVE BUSINESS KOELTL SAYS INVESTORS FAILED TO SHOW EATON HAD A DUTY TO DISCLOSE HYPOTHETICAL TAX CONSEQUENCES OF A SPINOFF OF ITS AUTOMOTIVE BUSINESS  WHICH NEVER TOOK PLACE U.S. DISTRICT JUDGE JOHN KOELTL IN MANHATTAN DISMISSES CLAIMS BROUGHT ON BEHALF OF INVEST
name: Eaton Corporation PLC
title: BRIEF-Eaton wins dismissal of shareholder lawsuit alleging securities fraud--US judge

content: June 16 Diversified manufacturer Eaton Corp  on Tuesday named the head of its industrial sector businesses to replace longtime Chief Executive Officer Sandy Cutler who is retiring.

title: Eaton taps industrial head to replace longtime CEO Cutler

content: April 29 Eaton Corp Plc  a maker of electrical and hydraulic systems  reported a 5 percent drop in quarterly revenue  hurt by a decline in sales in its electrical business.
name: Eaton Corporation PLC
title: Eaton revenue falls 5 pct  cuts 2015 forecast

content: Shares of diversified industrial company Eaton Corp Plc trade at a discount to the S&P 500 index and could rise 20 percent in the next year  according to Barron's.
name: Eaton Corporation PLC
title: Eaton shares could rise 20 pct in next year: Barron's

content: U.S. diversified manufacturer Eaton Corp Plc  posted higher-than-expected quarterly profit on Tuesday helped by  higher margins  sending its shares up more than 8 percent.
name: Eaton Corporation PLC
title: Eaton shares jump as higher margins help profit top views

content: Feb 3 U.S. diversified manufacturer Eaton Corp Plc posted higher-than-expected quarterly profit on Tuesday helped by  higher margins  sending its shares up more than 8 percent.

content: Feb 3 Eaton Corp Plc  a maker of electrical and hydraulics systems  reported a 21 percent rise in quarterly profit  helped by lower costs.
